text:
The assignment that was supposed to be finished at
the food court, none of us have finished it yet, though.

…Isn't the arm strength of this
claw machine too weak?

Instead of grabbing,
how about trying to hook it~?
I'll give it a go too.
Come on, give it your best shot…!
But, just a bit more of a break.
Until the sweet candy in my mouth melts.
